task.title: Quick start
task.shortdesc: Compile the Java sources and generate words/scores from a 7-tile rack.

prereq.p: Java 8+ installed. Ensure the dictionary file is accessible from the process working directory.

step.cmd: Place Scrabble.java, Tile.java, and CollinsScrabbleWords2019.txt in the same working directory.
Create a Scrabble instance and call getWords() or getScores().

result.p: You can generate spellable words and scores for the current 7-tile rack.
